20101203190713.500|20101203190716.000|CCO|SAID HE'S NOT GOING TO MAKE 
20101203190716.000|20101203190718.500|CCO|COMMENTS.
20101203190718.500|20101203190721.000|CCO|EVERY AFGHAN OFFICIAL SIMPLY
